Name: Puzzle Together Multiplayer Jigsaw
About the game: Jigsaw puzzle fun - on your own, with friends and family, or with new puzzle pals from around the world! Voice chat lets you feel like you're all sitting around the same table. Automatically sort pieces by edges or color. Choose from hundreds of beautiful images of all kinds, or create custom puzzles from your own pictures. Features 3D pieces and physics for a realistic puzzle-making experience!
